entry.title: 8 oz Custom Wedding Candles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Custom Printing
Price: 700.00 - 5225.00 (40 variants)

HOW IT WORKS:

  1. Select your fragrance, & quantity needed (50 minimum required).
  2. Enter the Wedding Date & the Couple’s Names (in the exact order you’d like them to appear in the design). This information is necessary to complete your order.
  3. Check out with your order. At checkout, select either local pickup (use code 'LOCALPICKUP') or proceed with shipping (rates may vary).
  4. After completing your purchase, no other information is needed. We’ll start on your order right away to fulfill in 5-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent your way once your order is ready to pick up or ship.
  5. Enjoy & delight your guests with unique, beautifully scented candles!

INGREDIENTS: Custom Wedding Candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, & even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils.
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, & cruelty free. These fragrances are also phthalate & paraben free.

entry.title: 8 oz Custom Event Candles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Custom Printing
Price: 1075.00 - 5675.00 (40 variants)

HOW IT WORKS:

  1. Choose your candle size, fragrance, and quantity (minimum 50).
  2. Before checkout, upload your design file.
  3. Complete the checkout process (For local pickup, use code 'LOCALPICKUP').
  4. Our design team will email you a proof within 1-2 business days.
  5. Review and approve the proof so our team can start creating your event candles.
  6. You will receive a shipping confirmation once your order is shipped.
  7. Enjoy & delight your guests with unique, beautifully scented candles!

INGREDIENTS: Custom Event Candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, & even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils.
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, & cruelty free. These fragrances are also phthalate & paraben free.

entry.title: Bulk 16 oz candles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bulk
Price: 255.00 - 1445.00 (49 variants)

Gifting just got easier! Whether you're planning a wedding, showing appreciation to your business team, or just need a LOT of candle gifts, you can SAVE MORE on cozy candles with our bulk 16 oz gifting options.



Orders typically ship within 1-3 days* to your place of business or home (shipping rates may vary). More savings details below. 👇 

If interested in additional quantities or customization options, let's chat! We'd love to help. Email: contact@antiquecandleco.com 

BURN TIME: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35+.

(*Additional processing time may be necessary for larger quantities or customization.)

 

Use of automatic coupon codes may not be available in conjunction with any gift cards, subscription boxes, or bulk/custom candle products where other coupons or discounts may have been applied at checkout.
